name: Jet War Mission
description:
Become the master of air warfare simulation in an extreme shooting warfare against massive aerial, land and sea enemies. Sweep the air clean of enemy threats and pilot an advanced warfare ready f18 jet fighter plane.

The damnation of the enemy is in your hand so dassault the holocaust enemy and anguish the enemy from your military base so it ruin the enemy plans of destroying your base. Hail the douglas combat sky fighter show them dominance by destroying them all. Load up an extreme arsenal of weapons, as you take command of the air warfare squad, navigating treacherous environments in an aerial battlefield.

Features
- Realistic aircraft combat game with 3D graphics
- Different weather conditions
- Easy and smooth gameplay
- Realistic Jet Fighter flight simulation
- Breathtaking air battles
